    • getApptByContact

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getApptByContact(int contactID) throws SQLException
      Gets Appointment by contact.
      Parameters:
      contactID - the contact id
      Returns:
      the Appointment by contact
      Throws:
      SQLException - the sql exception

      This method is used to get all appointments by contact.

      It is used in the Contact Schedule Report. This uses a Lambda to filter the appointments by contact.

    • appointmentOverlaps

      public static Boolean appointmentOverlaps(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String excludeID, int customerID) throws IOException, SQLException
      Appointment overlaps boolean.
      Parameters:
      start - the start
      end - the end
      excludeID - the exclude id
      customerID - the customer id
      Returns:
      the boolean
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception
      SQLException - the sql exception This method is used to check if an appointment overlaps with another appointment. It is used when creating a new appointment and updating an existing appointment. A Lambda is also uses here to loop though the list of appointments and check if the appointment overlaps.
